input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7ft. North Carolina Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree 931 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Calistoga Ornament Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel-Real Jersey Fraser Fir Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 4.5' Pre-Lit Noble Fir Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7' Belgium Fir Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Clear LED Lights'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 2.17-Feet Scotch pine Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T3402'
  - Name='Puleo 6.5ft Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9' Dual Color LED Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit artificial fir tree but a different fir type (Noble Fir vs Dunhill Fir) and different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 7ft. North Carolina Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree 931 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree with pre-lit and realistic branches, but different species (Spruce) and brand.
A specialized ornament tree rather than a full pre-lit decorative Christmas tree, less similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Feel-Real Jersey Fraser Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: From the same brand and a realistic fir tree, but different fir type and likely different construction features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 4.5' Pre-Lit Noble Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller pre-lit Noble Fir tree, similar function but smaller size and different fir type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 7' Belgium Fir Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Clear LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar fir tree with pre-lit clear LED lights, similar size and construction, though a different fir type and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree with a different species (White Spruce) and the flip branch system, similar function but some construction difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 2.17-Feet Scotch pine Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T3402
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller tree, different pine species, less similar size and scale.
Similar sized pre-lit artificial tree but unspecified fir type; likely comparable but less specific alignment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and same Dunhill Fir tree with pre-lit clear lights and PowerConnect feature, essentially the same product line.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9' Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Dunhill Fir tree from the same brand but larger size and dual color LED lights instead of clear lights.
